item.title: 万科股价季度跌幅将创新高 债务忧虑加剧
item.description: 中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co., Ltd.）股价将创下有记录以来的最大季度跌幅，因为在与债权人谈判延长其 20 亿元人民币（2.84 亿美元）债券支付期限之际，对该开发商财务健康状况的担忧加剧。【原文：China Vanke Co. shares are headed for their sharpest quarterly drop on record as worries over the developer’s financial health intensify amid talks with creditors to extend payment on its 2 billion yuan ($284 million) bond.】

item.title: 社交媒体巨头明年起受马来西亚法律约束
item.description: 从 1 月 1 日起，TikTok、Instagram 和其他主要社交媒体平台将自动受到马来西亚法律的管辖，这是政府推动保护儿童免受网络伤害和加强平台问责制的一部分。【原文：TikTok, Instagram and other major social media platforms will automatically come under Malaysia’s laws starting Jan. 1, part of a government push to shield children from online harms and strengthen platform accountability.】

item.title: 经济疲软导致涨势减弱，中国股市将迎来调整
item.description: 由于担心经济放缓和缺乏强有力的刺激措施，以科技股为主导的反弹失去了动力，衡量中国股市的一个重要指标正在进行技术性修正。【原文：A key gauge of Chinese shares is on course for a technical correction after a tech-led rally lost steam amid concerns about a slowing economy and a lack of strong stimulus measures.】

item.title: 美国计划减少二十国集团财长会议次数
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，华盛顿将在其担任 20 国集团主席国之初减少各国财政部长之间的会议次数，此举显然是为了简化多边进程。【原文：Washington is set to begin its turn as chair of the Group of 20 by reducing the number of meetings among finance chiefs, people familiar with the matter said, in an apparent move to streamline the multilateral process.】

item.title: Elham 与大和银行合作利用日本私人信贷
item.description: 据一份声明称，希尔豪斯投资公司（Hillhouse Investment）旗下的私人信贷部门 Elham Credit Partners 已与大和证券集团支持的一家数字投资银行合作，在亚太地区探索私人信贷机会，初期重点是日本。【原文：Elham Credit Partners, the private credit arm of Hillhouse Investment, has partnered with a Daiwa Securities Group-backed digital investment bank to explore private credit opportunities in Asia Pacific, with an initial focus on Japan, according to a statement.】

item.title: 新西兰政府稍后将恢复预算盈余
item.description: 由于经济复苏需要更长的时间才能形成势头，新西兰政府在进入选举年时将面临更严重的预算赤字和恢复盈余的延迟。【原文：The New Zealand government will head into an election year facing deeper budget deficits and a delayed return to surplus as an economic recovery takes longer to gather momentum.】

item.title: 关注乌克兰停火，石油价格接近 2021 年以来最低点
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了乌克兰停火的前景，这可能会为减少对俄罗斯原油流入已经供过于求的市场的限制铺平道路，石油维持在2021年以来的最低水平附近。【原文：Oil held near the lowest level since 2021 as traders weighed the outlook for a ceasefire in Ukraine, which could pave the way for fewer curbs on Russian crude flows into an already oversupplied market.】

item.title: Bjak 创始人考虑 IPO，马来西亚保险科技向海外扩张
item.description: 马来西亚最大的在线保险整合商 Bjak Sdn 正在酝酿在未来两年内进行首次公开募股，以进军欧洲市场。【原文：Bjak Sdn, Malaysia’s largest online insurance aggregator, is mulling an initial public offering within the next two years as it seeks to enter Europe.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行转向鹰派后消费者信心下滑
item.description: 由于储备银行表示其短暂的宽松周期已经结束，有可能在 2026 年恢复加息，澳大利亚消费者信心在 12 月份出现下滑。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence slumped in December as the Reserve Bank indicated that its brief easing cycle has come to an end and there’s the potential for a return to interest-rate hikes in 2026.】

item.title: 投资者等待就业数据，黄金五日反弹后趋于平稳
item.description: 黄金在连涨五天后企稳，投资者关注本周的一系列美国数据，这些数据应能为美联储进一步降息的意愿提供线索。【原文：Gold steadied after five days of gains, with investors focused on a raft of US data this week that should offer clues to the Federal Reserve’s appetite for further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 卢比下跌削弱了印度股市强劲复苏的希望
item.description: 印度卢比屡创新低，终于开始对股市造成压力，分析师警告说，长期疲软可能会削弱人们对这个价值 5.2 万亿美元的新兴股市复苏的信心。【原文：The Indian rupee’s slide to repeated record lows is finally starting to pinch the equity market, with analysts warning that prolonged weakness could undermine confidence in the nascent recovery of the $5.2 trillion stock market.】

item.description: 全球市场寒意袭来，美股和比特币承压，同时刺激了对国债和黄金的需求，投资者在今年最后一个完整交易周开始采取防御措施，亚洲股市注定下跌。【原文：Asian equities were set for declines as a chill fell across global markets, pressuring US stocks and Bitcoin while boosting demand for Treasuries and gold, with investors becoming defensive in the year’s final full trading week.】

item.title: 激进分子野村绫将从 SBI 控股公司获得 6400 万美元的报酬
item.description: 当 SBI 新世界银行有限公司（SBI Shinsei Bank Ltd.）本周开始交易时，日本最富有的女性之一将可能获得 100 亿日元（约合 6400 万美元）的意外之财。【原文：When SBI Shinsei Bank Ltd. starts trading this week, one of Japan’s wealthiest women will likely get a ¥10 billion ($64 million) windfall.】

item.title: 科进集团将以 33 亿美元收购华平投资的工程公司
item.description: 加拿大 WSP Global 公司在其最大股东的资金支持下，达成了从 Warburg Pincus LLC 控制的基金手中收购一家美国工程公司的协议。【原文：Canada’s WSP Global Inc. reached a deal to buy a US engineering firm from funds controlled by Warburg Pincus LLC with the financial backing of its largest shareholder.】

item.title: 英特尔聘用特朗普官员监督政府事务
item.description: 英特尔公司任命罗宾-科威尔（Robin Colwell）为负责政府事务的高级副总裁，由特朗普政府的一名官员负责监管这家芯片制造商与政策制定者和监管机构的关系。【原文：Intel Corp. named Robin Colwell as senior vice president of government affairs, enlisting a Trump administration official to oversee the chipmaker’s relationship with policymakers and regulators.】

item.description: 人们普遍预计日本央行行长上田一夫将在周五把日本央行的关键利率提高到三十年来的最高水平。随着政府对廉价融资的需求与日元疲软导致进口价格上涨之间的冲突，未来的道路将变得更加迷茫。【原文：Governor Kazuo Ueda is widely expected to raise the Bank of Japan’s key rate to the highest level in three decades on Friday. The path ahead becomes murkier as the government’s need for cheap financing clashes with a weakening yen that’s driving up import prices.】

item.title: 纽约称出租车和共享出行保险费率可能上涨 25
item.description: 据了解纽约州计划的人士透露，纽约州官员已告知共享出行公司、司机代表和其他出租汽车行业的人士，未来三年内保险费率将平均上涨 25%，乘客票价可能因此上涨。【原文：New York officials have told rideshare companies, driver representatives and others in the for-hire vehicle industry that insurance policy rates will rise by an average 25% over the next three years, according to people with knowledge of the state’s plans, likely sending passenger fares up as a result.】

item.title: 惠誉称：今年美国银行对竞争对手的贷款激增 26
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）的数据显示，美国银行正在向私人信贷公司、私募股权投资公司和对冲基金提供更多贷款，今年截至 11 月，向这些非银行金融机构提供的贷款额增长了 26%。【原文：US banks are lending more to private credit firms, private equity shops and hedge funds, with loan volume to these non-bank financial institutions up 26% this year through November, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: Stone Point 将以 10 亿美元基金加入推动零售财富的行列
item.description: 石点资本公司（Stone Point Capital）正在测试一个约 10 亿美元的基金，希望有朝一日能向富裕人士开放。【原文：Stone Point Capital is testing a roughly $1 billion fund that it hopes to one day open to wealthy individuals, as smaller private-markets firms seek to emulate their larger peers in tapping the multitrillion-dollar retail market.】

item.title: 巴里克夺回马里金矿和三吨黄金
item.description: 在双方于上个月解决了长达数年的争端之后，马里恢复了巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp）对卢洛-古恩科托（Loulo-Gounkoto）矿场的控制权，并将向该公司返还三吨黄金。【原文：Mali has restored control of the Loulo-Gounkoto mine to Barrick Mining Corp. and will return three tons of gold to the company after the two sides resolved a years-long dispute last month.】

item.title: 阿根廷中央银行将于 2026 年改变货币带系统
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统的政府宣布将在明年初改变货币交易带制度，并开始实施储备积累计划。【原文：President Javier Milei’s government announced it will change its currency trading band system and begin a reserve accumulation program at the start of next year.】
